Events.PreEventString: A cute Pokemon is happily bouncing around, it gifts you $1 with a smile.
Events.PostEventString: After giving you the gift, the shy pokemon bounces away

Events.PreEventString: A bully $1 is annoying everyone else in this pleasant day. This can't be allowed to happen!
Events.PostEventString: The bully learned it's lesson. They give you a $1 as an apology and leaves.

Events.PreEventString: All the Pokemon in the lake are singing around a pruple shining crystal. It talks to you: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
Relax time! You find an Azumarrill who is giving everyone massages!
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: Relax time! You find an Azumarrill who is giving everyone massages!
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from their status conditions.

Events.PreEventString: A happy $1 follows you for a while.
Events.PostEventString: It's in a really good mood, and wants to join your team!

Events.PreEventString: You were running by the edge of the water! A big no-no. You slip and hit yourself...
Events.PostEventString: Better be more careful next time!

Events.PreEventString: You were running by the edge of the water! A big no-no. You slip and hit yourself...
Events.PostEventString: $1 got hit quite bad, and injured it's hip. Its mobility is reduced

Events.PreEventString: $1 is chilling by the pond. It sees you and waves! What do you say to a quick fun battle?
Events.PostEventString: $1 had so much fun. You both wish this day would never end

Events.PreEventString: There's some ruins buried by the pond. I wonder what was here before?
Events.PostEventString: You don't see anything of value, but you do find a $1.

Events.PreEventString: Team Paradox members are chilling by the pond. They're playing music out loud and annoying everyone.
Events.PostEventString: They quickly apologize, they didn't realise the music was so loud. They lower the volume and give you $1.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You may be able to make it faster by bouncing through the lillypads, or just swim across..
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 allows to cross the lillypad brook.

Floors.ShortcutClue: A huge waterfall connects the ponds. Maybe you can find a way to quickly swim upwards through it.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 allows the party to cross the waterfall quickly.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You have reached the ruins of an old temple, partially sunk in the lake. Doesn't seem there's any way but forward.

BossEvent.PreEventString: In the center of the ruins, a slumbering titan made of steel. As you approach, the floor starts rumbling...
BossEvent.PostEventString: As you defeat the titan, the ground rumbles again. Your actions here have are changing the world.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: This are by the pond's shore is so pleasant. A perfect place for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But now it's time to move on...

PostBossEvent.PreEventString: ... After their hard work was done, the titans began their well deserved slumber.
PostBossEvent.PostEventString: They were never seen ever since. Despite the efforts of their most devout followers, they were never found.
